title: Sheikh Mohamed, Musk discuss AI cooperation
description: President His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan held talks with American entrepreneur Elon Musk, focusing on advances in artificial intelligence and emerging technologies and how cross-border collaboration can accelerate innovation with practical benefits for societies and economies. The meeting underscored Abu Dhabi’s ambition to position itself as a global hub for advanced technology while engaging with influential private-sector leaders shaping the future of AI, space [...]The article Sheikh Mohamed, Musk discuss AI cooperation appeared first on Arabian Post.

title: Digital Out of Home (DOOH) Advertising Market Expands at 13.5% CAGR as AI, Programmatic Buying & Smart City Displays Redefine Outdoor Advertising
description: The Digital Out of Home (DOOH) Advertising Market is growing at a CAGR of 13.5% from 2024 to 2031. This robust growth is driven by the shift toward dynamic, interactive, and data-driven advertising over static formats, advancements in technologies like

title: Flipkart Bets Big on GenAI With Majority Stake in Minivet AI
description: Flipkart acquires a majority stake in Minivet AI to scale generative video, semantic search, and immersive, AI-led shopping experiences.

title: Teen duped by AI Instagram account
description: An American teen has revealed how an AI account fooled her into believing she was interacting with a real person.

title: Centre's Push For Early AI Education: NCERT To Develop AI Textbooks
description: AI Textbooks In School: CBSE has already prepared a draft curriculum on AI and computational thinking for students from Classes 3 to 12.
